channel.title: Port forward and edit server
channel.description: hello. ive tried so many ways to port forward. i port forwarded my dlink DIR 615 and et ports to proper ect ect and people still cant connect maybe tell me or show me what im doing wrong and how to correct it. im going to edit a deltascape source for my first actully server im wondering how i move and add objects and npcs and how to make the npcs talk if you could help mainly with port forward itd be so much oh help thank you [ if help ill rep if i can ]

item.title: Port forward and edit server
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

[quote=“ynnah, post:3, topic:312374”]Ok I had the same problem too for a while.
But all you have to do first is see what antivirus you have, and is it running a firewall.
If it is then you most likely will have to disable it because its probbaly blocking all incoming “unknown” coonections.

If that doesn’t solve it then It might be you Windows firewall (If you run windows)
So go to your control panel and click security then windows firewall and either turn it off or put it to where it enables
exceptions.

And if that doesn’t work then IDK?[/quote]
alright so i have my antivirus up ( and im using windows vista ) what am i supposed to do with my antivirus thing?

Read full topic

item.title: Port forward and edit server
item.dc:creator: @ynnah ynnah
item.description:
@ynnah wrote:

Ok I had the same problem too for a while.
But all you have to do first is see what antivirus you have, and is it running a firewall.
If it is then you most likely will have to disable it because its probbaly blocking all incoming “unknown” coonections.

If that doesn’t solve it then It might be you Windows firewall (If you run windows)
So go to your control panel and click security then windows firewall and either turn it off or put it to where it enables
exceptions.

And if that doesn’t work then IDK?

Read full topic

item.title: Port forward and edit server
item.dc:creator: @killar456 killar456
item.description:
@killar456 wrote:

Just curious, What client are you using? “Rune-Warfare” client?

If not, are you forwarding your port? the default is “43594”

Read full topic
